name: Elite Para Troopers Strike
description:
The elite para troopers strike is a stealth shooting mission in which you are going to take part as a spy commando-shooter. Gear up with modern weaponry and start your secret mission being a paramilitary commando. Jump off the military airplane as a guerrilla commando and experience the most thrilling adventure of skydiving for the first time. Enjoy the realistic simulation of diving in the skies while facing the enemy counterattacks. Safely land in the enemy territory and find some good hideouts to equip your weapons. You can switch the simple guns or choose an assault rifle with long range and high firing accuracy. Also, you can use the sniper rifles to take down the enemy guards on the watchtowers. Have a clean shoot and don’t miss a single fire else your cover will blow in no time. Use the telescopic zoom for a clear view and take the silent shots only. Just enjoy the most realistic shooting simulation with physics-based smooth gameplay for the first time.

As an elite paratrooper, you have to do multiple jobs. First, land into the enemy territory with extreme care. Next, clear the enemy area so that you can rescue the hostages without any trouble. The gameplay is simple and smooth but not easy. You have to prove your shooting skills while playing each commando mission. Once you miss a gunshot, all the enemy militants will be on to you. Use the radar navigation to find the enemy hideouts and make some strategic plans to approach the enemy base camps. There are multiple terrains in this FPS game. Play the multiple missions in jungles, deserts and in the big cities. Don’t waste the bullets while shooting as you have limited ammo. If you run out of ammunition then purchase the bullet packs using the coins. You can earn coins by watching reward videos or simply clear the missions to earn the coins.

Be a silent commando while performing the elite paratrooper strikes. The hostile area is full of enemy elite force commandos, so silent moves and long-range sniper shots are the perfect way to survive in this survival shooting game. Execute all the enemies & terrorists to free the hostages and be quick. Avoid face to face combat and use the health packs whenever your health gets low. Upgrade new weapons with powerful shots and accuracy for the advance missions. Enjoy the real skydiving game with the epic commando gun shooting missions and feel yourself a real skydiver.
 
How to Play:

• Tilt your Android device to control the paratrooper movements.
• After landing, use the virtual joystick to move around.
• Swipe the finger across the screen to set aim.
• Tap the bullet sign to shoot.

Top Features of Elite Para Troopers Strike Game:

• Different terrains and high-definition graphics.
• Most realistic skydiving game.
• Advance weaponry and arms.
• Multi-level gameplay.
• Free to download.
• Works offline.

If you like the elite para troopers strike game, please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.
